name: Double Feature: Adventures in the Microzone
overview: An Adventure: Double Feature is a series of two adventure-themed choose your own adventure graphical text adventure. In Adventures in the Microzone, the player is somehow shrunk to 2 inches in size when they use their computer in the early morning. The player must explore either their own or their grandfather's room in search of the computer manual to return themselves to size. Along the way, they player might have to explore a maze of straws, avoid the dangers of caffeine, and try not to get lost in their messy closet.
